headline: Assessing STERIS (STE) Valuation After Recent Share Price Gains And Strong Long Term Returns
summary: Why STERIS Is On Watch For Investors Now STERIS (STE) has attracted attention after recent share price moves, with the stock showing a 4.7% gain over the past month and a 7.6% rise over the past 3 months. headline: Sterilization Services Market Research and Global Forecast Report 2025-2030: E-Beam Advantages, Ethylene Oxide Reintroduction, and Healthcare Expansion Support Growth
summary: The global sterilization services market is set to reach USD 5.49 billion by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 7.9% from 2025, driven by increasing hospital-acquired infections, rising surgical procedures, and a focus on food sterilization. Outsourcing sterilization and stringent regulations in pharma and medical device sectors propel demand. Ethylene oxide (EtO) sterilization leads, with medical devices as the top end-users. headline: Is It Too Late To Consider STERIS (STE) After A 20% One-Year Share Price Gain?
summary: If you are wondering whether STERIS at around US$261 per share is still a reasonable entry point or starting to look stretched, you are not alone. The stock has seen a 0.5% decline over the last 7 days, a 4.7% return over the past month and year to date, and a 20.5% return over the last year, which naturally raises questions about how much of its story is already reflected in the price. headline: STERIS Announces Financial Results for Fiscal 2026 Third Quarter
summary: Total revenue from continuing operations increased 9%; constant currency organic revenue grew 8% As reported EPS from continuing operations increased to $1.96; adjusted EPS increased to $2.53Fiscal 2026 outlook maintained DUBLIN, IRELAND, Feb. 04, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- STERIS plc (NYSE: STE) (“STERIS” or the “Company”) today announced financial results for its fiscal 2026 third quarter ended December 31, 2025.
